refnamediv.refpurpose: Read a line of text from an external file.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Read a line of text from an external file once on initialisation.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifilname -- an integer N denoting a file named "input.N" or a character string (in double quotes, spaces permitted) denoting the external file name. For a string, it may either be a full path name with directory specified or a simple filename. In the later case, the file is sought first in the current directory, then in SSDIR, and finally in SFDIR.
iline -- line number, or -1 when end of file has been reached.
Sres -- output of the line read from ifilname.

This opcode allows a line of text to be read from a named external file. There may be any number of readfi opcodes in an instrument or orchestra but they read separately from the same or different files.
